page.title: 12CANTLEY VILLAGE
page.content: Cantley is a small village situated about 3 miles south east of Doncaster. The{buildings}are predominantly residential and vary greatly in both age and style.The largest building is {Cantley Hall}built about 300 years ago and still a private residence.There are also some small cottages built about the same period.During the last 20 years there has been some{new {development,}which has doubled the number of homes. The villagers have no special {services}and must go elsewhere for medical services,shops and leisure activities.There are only two{buses } per week from the village to the town. One of the main{disadvantages}of living in the village is the noise from vehicles passing constantly day & night.During peak times 750 vehicles per hour have been counted.
